info.title: ApplicationInsightsManagementClient
info.description: Azure Application Insights client for API keys of a component.

get.description: Get the API Key for this key id.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.

parameters.name: keyId
parameters.description: The API Key ID. This is unique within a Application Insights component.

200.description: The API Key for this key id.

delete.description: Delete an API Key of an Application Insights component.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.

parameters.name: keyId
parameters.description: The API Key ID. This is unique within a Application Insights component.

200.description: The API Key that was successfully deleted.

get.description: Gets a list of API keys of an Application Insights component.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.

200.description: A list containing 0 or more API key definitions of an Application Insights component.

post.description: Create an API Key of an Application Insights component.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.

requestBody.description: Properties that need to be specified to create an API key of a Application Insights component.

200.description: An object containing the API Key definition created by this POST call.

linkedReadProperties.description: The read access rights of this API Key.

linkedWriteProperties.description: The write access rights of this API Key.

name.description: The name of the API Key.

APIKeyRequest.description: An Application Insights component API Key creation request definition.

apiKey.description: The API key value. It will be only return once when the API Key was created.

createdDate.description: The create date of this API key.

id.description: The unique ID of the API key inside an Application Insights component. It is auto generated when the API key is created.

linkedReadProperties.description: The read access rights of this API Key.

linkedWriteProperties.description: The write access rights of this API Key.

name.description: The name of the API key.

ApplicationInsightsComponentAPIKey.description: Properties that define an API key of an Application Insights Component.

ApplicationInsightsComponentAPIKeyListRe.description: Describes the list of API Keys of an Application Insights Component.

KeyId.name: keyId
KeyId.description: The API Key ID. This is unique within a Application Insights component.

ResourceNameParameter.name: resourceName
ResourceNameParameter.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.
